div.p: "THE O'REILLY FACTOR" BEGINS RIGHT NOW.

NOT. CNN SAYS 43% FAVOR, 55% APPROVE.

PLAIN AND CLEAR THAT THE UNITED STATES WILL ACT IF WE MUST.
OUR CREDIBLE THREAT OF FORCE HAS MADE THESE DIPLOMATIC
